## RouteTableAssociation Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

The RouteTableAssociation resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">

            title="Required">
        <span id="transitgatewayattachmentid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#transitgatewayattachmentid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Transit<wbr>Gateway<wbr>Attachment<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Attachment.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="transitgatewayroutetableid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#transitgatewayroutetableid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Transit<wbr>Gateway<wbr>Route<wbr>Table<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Route Table.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="replaceexistingassociation_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#replaceexistingassociation_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Replace<wbr>Existing<wbr>Association</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Boolean whether the Gateway Attachment should remove any current Route Table association before associating with the specified Route Table. Default value: <code>false</code>. This argument is intended for use with EC2 Transit Gateways shared into the current account, otherwise the <code>transit_gateway_default_route_table_association</code> argument of the <code>aws.ec2transitgateway.VpcAttachment</code> resource should be used.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#transit_gateway_route_table_id_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">transit_<wbr>gateway_<wbr>route_<wbr>table_<wbr>id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Route Table.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="replace_existing_association_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#replace_existing_association_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">replace_<wbr>existing_<wbr>association</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Boolean whether the Gateway Attachment should remove any current Route Table association before associating with the specified Route Table. Default value: <code>false</code>. This argument is intended for use with EC2 Transit Gateways shared into the current account, otherwise the <code>transit_gateway_default_route_table_association</code> argument of the <code>aws.ec2transitgateway.VpcAttachment</code> resource should be used.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="yaml">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="transitgatewayattachmentid_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#transitgatewayattachmentid_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">transit<wbr>Gateway<wbr>Attachment<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Attachment.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="transitgatewayroutetableid_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#transitgatewayroutetableid_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">transit<wbr>Gateway<wbr>Route<wbr>Table<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Route Table.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="replaceexistingassociation_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#replaceexistingassociation_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">replace<wbr>Existing<wbr>Association</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Boolean whether the Gateway Attachment should remove any current Route Table association before associating with the specified Route Table. Default value: <code>false</code>. This argument is intended for use with EC2 Transit Gateways shared into the current account, otherwise the <code>transit_gateway_default_route_table_association</code> argument of the <code>aws.ec2transitgateway.VpcAttachment</code> resource should be used.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="typescript,javascript,python,go,csharp,java">
The following state arguments are supported:


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_replaceexistingassociation_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_replaceexistingassociation_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Replace<wbr>Existing<wbr>Association</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Boolean whether the Gateway Attachment should remove any current Route Table association before associating with the specified Route Table. Default value: <code>false</code>. This argument is intended for use with EC2 Transit Gateways shared into the current account, otherwise the <code>transit_gateway_default_route_table_association</code> argument of the <code>aws.ec2transitgateway.VpcAttachment</code> resource should be used.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_resourceid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_resourceid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Resource<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Identifier of the resource</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_resourcetype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_resourcetype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Resource<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Type of the resource</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_transitgatewayattachmentid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_transitgatewayattachmentid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Transit<wbr>Gateway<wbr>Attachment<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Attachment.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Boolean whether the Gateway Attachment should remove any current Route Table association before associating with the specified Route Table. Default value: <code>false</code>. This argument is intended for use with EC2 Transit Gateways shared into the current account, otherwise the <code>transit_gateway_default_route_table_association</code> argument of the <code>aws.ec2transitgateway.VpcAttachment</code> resource should be used.</p>

## Import



Using `pulumi import`, import `aws_ec2_transit_gateway_route_table_association` using the EC2 Transit Gateway Route Table identifier, an underscore, and the EC2 Transit Gateway Attachment identifier. For example:

```sh
 $ pulumi import aws:ec2transitgateway/routeTableAssociation:RouteTableAssociation example tgw-rtb-12345678_tgw-attach-87654321
```
